sections.title: Diabolist (PZO9213) (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Diabolist (PZO9213) class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: Diabolists gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor.

sections.title: **Spells per Day** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: Diabolist levels advance spellcasting progression from a previous class but grant no other class benefits.

sections.title: **Damned** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: When killed, the diabolist's soul goes to Hell and resurrection requires a caster level check (DC 10 + diabolist level).

sections.title: **Imp Companion** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The diabolist gains an imp companion that advances like an animal companion and can be replaced through a 24-hour ritual if slain.

sections.title: **Infernal Charisma** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The diabolist gains a bonus on Charisma checks when interacting with devils that increases with level (+2/+4/+6).

sections.title: **Channel Hellfire** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: As a free action, the diabolist can alter energy damage spells to deal hellfire damage (lawful and evil descriptors) a number of times per day equal to Charisma modifier.

sections.title: **Infernal Bargain** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: When using planar ally spells, the diabolist can make an opposed Charisma check to halve a called devil's service price.

sections.title: **Augment Summoning** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The diabolist gains the Augment Summoning feat without meeting prerequisites.

sections.title: **Heresy** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The diabolist gains a bonus on checks to research devils' true names or sigils (+2, increasing to +4 at 9th level).

sections.title: **Hellish Soul** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The diabolist can be resurrected normally if killed by means other than the will of Asmodeus or other Hell authorities.

sections.title: **Infernal Transport (Sp)** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The diabolist can transport through Hell twice per day as dimension door, or expend both uses for teleport, but cannot enter areas warded against evil.

sections.title: **Hellfire Ray (Sp)** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The diabolist can use hellfire ray twice per day as a spell-like ability.

sections.title: **Master Conjurer** (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The diabolist can cast calling spells as a standard action and bargain as a move action, adding half of a social skill modifier to bargaining checks.

sections.title: Class Level (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The imp companion's effective level equals the diabolist's class level plus highest caster level, not stacking with other animal companion classes.

sections.title: HD (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: Imp companions use d10 Hit Dice for advancement.

sections.title: BAB (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The imp companion's base attack bonus advances normally but doesn't grant additional natural attacks.

sections.title: Saving Throws (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: Imp companions have good Reflex and Will saves.

sections.title: Skills (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: Imp companions gain skill ranks (multiply listed value by 3) with specific class skills and cannot exceed ranks equal to Hit Dice.

sections.title: Feats (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: Imp companions may select any feat for which they qualify.

sections.title: Bonus Tricks (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: Imp companions can choose additional alternate forms, spell-like abilities, or telepathy as bonus tricks.

sections.title: Link (Su) (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The diabolist has an empathic link with her imp within 1 mile, sharing general emotions and connections to items or places.

sections.title: Share Spells (Diabolist (PZO9213))
sections.description: The diabolist can cast spells with target "You" on her imp as touch spells, even if they don't normally affect outsiders.
